casebody.data:
Donna J. JOHNSON, an individual; and Build Design Concepts, Inc., a Nevada corporation, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Michelle Leavitt, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Heidi Putze, an individual; and Map 4, LLC, a Nevada limited-liability company, Real Parties in Interest. No. 75696 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 15, 2018

DENIED.
